conbody.p: Adobe® developed AppMeasurement for Symbian to provide a mechanism to capture usage of native Symbian C++ applications in marketing reports. AppMeasurement for Symbian lets you capture application events so you can monitor and evaluate the use of your Symbian applications.
AppMeasurement for Symbian leverages the standard Symbian development tools to let you integrate Symbian application tracking into both new and existing Symbian applications.
